message.downloadInfo: Alternatively, the print job can be downloaded for editing in Composer.
message.moveOffline: This will reject the job and download it for editing in composer.
message.moveOffline_one: This will reject the selected job and download it for editing in composer.
message.moveOffline_other: This will reject the selected jobs and download them for editing in composer.
message.noJobsToReview: Provisional jobs that have been promoted will appear here. Upload parts in the inbox to get started.
message.noPartsToReprint: Parts in this job have already been requeued for reprinting.
message.rejectInfo: Pressing 'Reshuffle' will result in part position and rotation being varied as part of a new print job. Some parts may be removed or added during the reshuffle.
message.reprintParts: Selected parts will be prioritised for reprinting as part of the next suitable print job.
message.reprintPartsKey: Parts in grey have already been reprinted.
message.requeueParts: This will mark the job as rejected and move all parts in the job back to the queue.

awaitingApproval.name: Awaiting approval
awaitingApproval.tooltip: The finalised Job is ready to review.

cancelled.name: Cancelled
cancelled.tooltip: The print job has been cancelled before it finished or deleted from the build queue.

failed.name: Failed
failed.tooltip:
The print job has failed.

Refer to the printer screen for more information.

generating.name: Finalising print job
generating.tooltip: The provisional Job layout has been finalised and the print layers are being prepared.

nestingFailed.name: Nesting Failed
nestingFailed.tooltip: The nesting of parts has failed. This could be caused by issues with one or more of the part files.

offline.name: Reworked offline
offline.tooltip: The Job was downloaded to edit and send in Composer.

printing.name: Printing
printing.tooltip: The Job is currently being printed.

printPending.name: Print pending
printPending.tooltip: The Job is on the printer and ready to print.

provisional.name: Provisional
provisional.tooltip:
Job is in a provisional state and will become finalised when:
- more parts are added to fill the job, and
- a suitable printer is about to be available to print it
The job can also manually be promoted to a finalised state.

rejected.name: Rejected
rejected.tooltip: The job was rejected and the parts have been requeued.

sendingFailed.name: Sending failed
sendingFailed.tooltip:
The print job failed when sending to the printer.

Check the printer is online and try resending the job.

sendingToPrinter.name: Sending to printer
sendingToPrinter.tooltip: The print layers are being sent to the printer.

slicing.name: Slicing print job
slicing.tooltip: The print layers are being prepared.

slicingFailed.name: Slicing failed
slicingFailed.tooltip:
The print job has failed whilst preparing the print layers.

This could be caused by issues with the part files.

tooltips.accepted: All jobs that have been accepted are shown here, alongside their status.
tooltips.provisional:
This shows the expected upcoming jobs based on printer availability, template compatibility and unprinted parts in the Funnel.

Promoting them will create a finalised print job that will include the identified parts, layout and target printer. When supports have been generated for finalised jobs, they will appear in the 'To Review' tab.
tooltips.rejected: All jobs that have been rejected are shown here.
tooltips.toReview: Print jobs that are ready to review are shown here. Accept them to send to the printer.
